statements: SELECT badge_name, date_earned FROM badges WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM badges WHERE badge_id = 3;
SELECT student_id, badge_name FROM badges WHERE date_earned > '2022-01-01';
SELECT badge_name, date_earned FROM badges WHERE student_id = 2 ORDER BY date_earned DESC;

SELECT * FROM badges WHERE badge_id = 1;
SELECT badge_name, date_earned FROM badges WHERE student_id = 100 ORDER BY date_earned DESC;

SELECT badge_id, student_id FROM badges WHERE date_earned BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(badge_id) AS total_badges FROM badges WHERE student_id = 300;
SELECT * FROM badges;
SELECT badge_id, badge_name FROM badges WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE achieved_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT badge_id, badge_name, earned_date FROM badges WHERE student_id = 456 ORDER BY earned_date DESC;
SELECT achievement_name, achieved_date FROM achievements WHERE student_id = 789 ORDER BY achieved_date ASC;
SELECT badge_id, badge_name, student_id, earned_date FROM badges WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE achieved_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY achievement_name DESC;
SELECT badge_id, badge_name, earned_date FROM badges WHERE earned_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY badge_name ASC;
SELECT badge_name, student_id, COUNT(*) AS total_badges FROM badges GROUP BY badge_name, student_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(DISTINCT badge_name) AS unique_badges FROM badges GROUP BY student_id HAVING unique_badges >= 3;
SELECT badge_id, badge_name, badge_description FROM Badges;
SELECT achievement_name, student_id, date_achieved FROM Achievements WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_name = 'Alice';

SELECT student_name, date_joined FROM Students ORDER BY date_joined DESC;

SELECT student_name, student_email, date_joined FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE '%John%' AND student_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT badge_name, student_name, date_joined FROM Badges JOIN Students ON Badges.student_id = Students.student_id;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_description, student_email FROM Achievements JOIN Students ON Achievements.student_id = Students.student_id WHERE date_achieved >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN enrolled_courses ON students.student_id = enrolled_courses.student_id JOIN courses ON enrolled_courses.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE enrolled_courses.enrollment_date < '2022-09-01';
